display_html: (.-) ∷ ∀ m st sig err. (MonadIO m, MonadReader (st → sig → Either err st) m, Show err, HasCallStack) ⇒ m st → sig → m st

(.->>) ∷ ∀ m st. (MonadIO m, Eq st, ToExpr st, HasCallStack) ⇒ m st → st → m st
checkTrace ∷ ∀ s m. (STS s, BaseM s ~ m) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Environment s → ReaderT (State s → Signal s → Either (NonEmpty (PredicateFailure s)) (State s)) IO (State s) → IO ()
name: checkTrace

}
name: Trace Trace _traceEnv _traceInitState _traceTrans

class STS sts ⇒ HasTrace sts traceGenEnv where
  • type BaseEnv sts ∷ Type
  • interpretSTS ∷ ∀ a. HasCallStack ⇒ BaseEnv sts → BaseM sts a → a
  • envGen ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ traceGenEnv → Gen (Environment sts)
  • sigGen ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ traceGenEnv → Environment sts → State sts → Gen (Signal sts)
  • shrinkSignal ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ Signal sts → [Signal sts]
name: HasTrace BaseEnv envGen sigGen shrinkSignal interpretSTS
